unnormalised: **Social Media & Influencer Marketing News: Are You *Really* Seeing the Whole Picture?**
normalised: **Social Media and Influencer Marketing News: Are You *Really* Seeing the Whole Picture?**

unnormalised: Hey fam, feeling lost in the 'gram jungle? Turns out, those follower counts might be more mirage than oasis. New follower analytics tools are digging deep, uncovering ghost followers and engagement pods galore! Think your 10k followers are all clamoring for your biryani recipe? Think again, beta!
normalised: Hey fam, feeling lost in the 'gram jungle? Turns out, those follower counts might be more mirage than oasis. New follower analytics tools are digging deep, uncovering ghost followers and engagement pods galore! Think your ten thousand followers are all clamoring for your biryani recipe? Think again, beta!

unnormalised: Experts at IIT-Bombay are saying basic follower counts are seriously misleading. These new analytics platforms are tracking things like genuine engagement rates, bot activity, and even audience demographics â€“ are they actually from Kerala if you're promoting Onam content?!
normalised: Experts at I I T-Bombay are saying basic follower counts are seriously misleading. These new analytics platforms are tracking things like genuine engagement rates, bot activity,, and even audience demographics - are they actually from Kerala if you are promoting Onam content?!

unnormalised: Some desi influencer marketing agencies are already using this tech. Apparently, many influencers have inflated their numbers by buying followers, a practice known as "faking it till you make it," but it's catching up now.
normalised: Some desi influencer marketing agencies are already using this tech. Apparently, many influencers have inflated their numbers by buying followers, a practice known as "faking it till you make it," but it is catching up now.

unnormalised: So, before you throw your Rupees at that influencer with 500k followers, do your homework. Real, engaged followers are worth more than a million bots, folks! This Diwali, let's focus on quality over quantity, both in our relationships and our social media game!
normalised: So, before you throw your Rupees at that influencer with five hundred thousand followers, do your homework. Real, engaged followers are worth more than a million bots, folks! This Diwali, let us focus on quality over quantity, both in our relationships and our social media game!
